detaileddescription.para:
Get a pointer to the beginning of the payload data of the RTP packet.
packet
a RTP packet represented as a mblk_t
start
a pointer to the beginning of the payload data, pointing inside the packet.
the length of the payload data.

Obtain the extension header if any.
packet
the RTP packet.
profile
the profile field of the extension header
start_ext
pointer that will be set to the beginning of the payload of the extension header.
the size of the extension in bytes (the payload size, it can be 0), -1 if parsing of the extension header failed or if no extension is present.
